RepositoryDescription: Repository for the MetadataRenamer plugin - automatically renames series folders when metadata is identified

Plugins.Name: MetadataRenamer
Plugins.Overview: Automatically renames series folders to {SeriesName} ({Year}) [{provider}-{id}] format when metadata is identified
Plugins.Description: MetadataRenamer automatically renames series folders when you identify a series in Jellyfin. It uses the format: {SeriesName} ({Year}) [{provider}-{id}], for example: 'The Flash (2014) [tvdb-279121]'. The plugin only renames when provider IDs change (inferring that Identify/refresh just happened), includes safety features like dry-run mode, collision checks, and per-item cooldown periods.
